name: Build My House
description:
Shortcuts: 

Q = convert all resources into credits

1 credit = 5 log, 3 water, 2 hay

Left Shift: open & close shop window

E = chop trees

R = Take hays

F = Take water

Movement:

- WASD = Forward, Backward, Left, Right

- Space = Jump

- Left click another planet to move to that planet

Mission:

Get as much credit as you can and upgrade your entire house in shop(shift) as fast as possible!
